bibl.title: The Meinarti Phylactery Factory: Medieval Nubian Ostraka from the Island of Michael.
bibl.note: Greek and Old Nubian ostraka from the Christian period [and one hieroglyphic stela] excavated in the early 1960s. - 1. Inv. 6.K.3-11. Unknown text in Old Nubian. - 2. Inv. 6.K.3-16. Greek invocation of the Trinity. - 3. Inv. 6.K.3-136. Old Nubian alphabet with numerical cryptograms. [- 4. Hieroglyphic stela from the New Kingdom.] - 5. Inv. 6.K.3-294. Magical text [in Greek]. - 6. Inv. 6.K.3-296. Psalm 100:6-8 [in Greek]. - 7. Inv. 6.K.3-385. Personal name [in Greek]. - 8. Inv. 6.K.3-405. Owner's graffito [in Greek or in Old Nubian]. - 9. Inv. 6.K.3-424. Psalm 100:7 (?) [in Greek]. - 10. Inv. 6.K.3-641. Psalm 90:7-11 [in Greek]. - 11. Inv. 6.K.3-707. Psalm 90:1-6 [in Greek]. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Giovanni R. Ruffini, The Meinarti Phylactery Factory: Medieval Nubian Ostraka from the Island of Michael.

Greek and Old Nubian ostraka from the Christian period [and one hieroglyphic stela] excavated in the early 1960s. - 1. Inv. 6.K.3-11. Unknown text in Old Nubian. - 2. Inv. 6.K.3-16. Greek invocation of the Trinity. - 3. Inv. 6.K.3-136. Old Nubian alphabet with numerical cryptograms. [- 4. Hieroglyphic stela from the New Kingdom.] - 5. Inv. 6.K.3-294. Magical text [in Greek]. - 6. Inv. 6.K.3-296. Psalm 100:6-8 [in Greek]. - 7. Inv. 6.K.3-385. Personal name [in Greek]. - 8. Inv. 6.K.3-405. Owner's graffito [in Greek or in Old Nubian]. - 9. Inv. 6.K.3-424. Psalm 100:7 (?) [in Greek]. - 10. Inv. 6.K.3-641. Psalm 90:7-11 [in Greek]. - 11. Inv. 6.K.3-707. Psalm 90:1-6 [in Greek]. - Conclusion.
